data.title: Spiegelworld
data.meta_description: Expect Spiegelworld’s signature blitz of the ridiculous, the funny, the jaw-dropping, and the superhuman at The Hook.
data.text:
Getting Into the Venue

The Hook and Superfrico are located on Caesars property next to the Wild West Casino in Atlantic City. For easiest access to the venue, we recommend you enter through the hotel’s main entrance; continuing through the lobby and casino, following the signs for “The Boardwalk”. After coming outside you’ll make a left and walk toward “The Hook” Marquee. There you’ll enter through the doors marked “Horse Dive Bar” and be greeted by our box office or host team.

During the winter months patrons can enter the venue through the Horse Dive Bar door in the Wild West Casino. This door is on the south side of Wild West next to Guy Fieri’s BBQ.

There is an elevator inside the venue to access seating on our mezzanine level.

For more information visit Spiegelworld x Accessibility.

Customer Assistance

Patrons requiring assistance to reach their seats or other accessibility support can contact the box office ahead of time to arrange for a representative to meet them at the entrance to the theater. The box office can be reached by phone, (888) 966-0404 or email [email protected].

There is no coat check available for the storage of garments, large bags or luggage. Storage for mobility devices will be provided.

How To Book

For those who require special assistance or wish to buy tickets for wheelchair designated spaces, it is important to book in advance and notify our box office team of any support needs.

Tickets for all accessible seating can be booked online, but for further information and assistance please call one of our toll-free numbers (888) 966-0404 or (702) 534-3419 or email us at [email protected].

Restrooms

Restrooms are located outside of our venue on Caesars property. There is a wheelchair accessible restroom available inside the Wild West restrooms, located just across the hall from our venue.

Accessibility Support

The Hook and Superfrico currently offer the following Accessibility Support. For additional information or to request an access need that is not listed here, please reach out to our box office team for additional assistance.

ADA Compliant

Wheelchair Accessible Seating

ASL Interpreted Performances

Vegan | Vegetarian Dining Options

Non-Alcoholic Beverage Selection

Service Animal Friendly

Seating at The Hook is step-free for all patrons in Rows A-C and E-F and can be reached from the venue entrance via a ramp. There are 10 designated wheelchair spaces available for each performance and are located throughout the lower level of the theater – B5, B6, C8, C9, G27, G28, G40, G41, and T15.

Seats designated for ASL Interpretation are – Booth 10 and Booth 20.

Superfrico offers a variety of seating options including booths, banquets, arm chairs (with and without arms), and bar stools. We want our guests to feel at their most comfortable while dining with us so please be sure to note any seating preferences in your reservation. For any additional seating questions, or to make a more specific access need request please reach out to our box office team.

Sensory Warning

The Hook and Superfrico have sound and lighting levels that can be as intense as a loud music concert and features many high-intensity and thrilling acts. Flashing lights, strobes, haze, and other moving lights are occasionally present throughout the performance, as well as acts that include audience interaction and/or physical contact.
